text:
Lots of differences. In EFTA we'd be:
Outside the CAP & CFP 
Outside the Customs Union
Outside the ECJ. Under EFTA Court w British judges
In the strongest bloc in Europe

text:
TODAY IS: the Autumnal Equinox. It is the time of the year when the sun is directly in line with the Earth's equator and daytime and nighttime are of equal duration all over the planet.

text:
It's that time of year... 
1st year students are on campus

-born 1999/2000
-no memory of 9/11
-no memory of Iraq War
-no memory of Tony Blair
-only vague memory of 2008 crash
-first memorable election was 2010
-couldn't vote in EURef
-"only ever lived in austerity"

#HigherEd

html: Andrew, you are wrong. I campaigned for Remain. I spoke at #BigTent. I can tell you stopping #Brexit, #softBrexit & #hardBrexit were all debated, including by me. @GeorgeFreemanMP should be congratulated. And Andrew, I hope ill-informed commentary will 'fizzle into nothingness'.
text: Andrew, you are wrong. I campaigned for Remain. I spoke at #BigTent. I can tell you stopping #Brexit, #softBrexit & #hardBrexit were all debated, including by me. @GeorgeFreemanMP should be congratulated. And Andrew, I hope ill-informed commentary will 'fizzle into nothingness'.
